r2dii.analysis 0.0.0.9004

  • r2dii

Add portfolio-level production targets

Source: R/add_portfolio_target.R
add_portfolio_target.Rd

This function calculates the portfolio-level production targets, as calculated using either the technology market share ratio tmsr or sector market share percentage smsp.

add_portfolio_target(data)

Arguments

data

A "data.frame" like the output of summarize_portfolio_production().

Value

A tibble with the same groups as the input (if any) and columns: tmsr_target_weighted_production and smsp_target_weighted_production.

Examples

library(r2dii.analysis)
library(r2dii.data)
library(r2dii.match)

master <- r2dii.data::loanbook_demo %>%
  r2dii.match::match_name(r2dii.data::ald_demo) %>%
  r2dii.match::prioritize() %>%
  join_ald_scenario(r2dii.data::ald_demo,
    r2dii.data::scenario_demo_2020,
    region_isos = region_isos_demo
  )

portfolio_production <- summarize_portfolio_production(master)
portfolio_production
#> # A tibble: 684 x 7
